description: Details of new external doors sections and elevations, new rooflights demonstrating that these are conservation rooflights, new windows, including the new windows and panelled stallriser to mews, mansard construction details demonstrating that the external height and extent of the mansard does not exceed that shown on the submitted application drawings and a revised more traditional detailed design for the mews entrance door and additional details of the fire suppression system proposed in the mews building, including revised drawings showing proposed locations for fixtures and fittings and indicative services routes and their relationship to retained fabric and details of any new service routes and/or connections for the system in the main house pursuant to Conditions 4 and 5 of listed building dated 28th December 2023 (RN:23/07347/LBC)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
